column1: A personal trainer can: - Assess your current level of fitness - Help you find an exercise program that is safe and works well for you - Help you set and achieve realistic fitness goals - Teach you the correct way to do exercises - Help you get the most out of your workout time - Offer support, guidance, and feedback - Provide motivation to continue exercising - Work with your doctor or other health care professionals to create an exercise program if you are recovering from an illness or injury - Offer advice on lifestyle changes to improve fitness
Providers and dietitians are the only health professionals qualified to give specific nutritional advice.
